meanings.definition: A person with whom one works.
meanings.sent1: My workmate helped me finish the project on time.
meanings.sent2: I have a friendly workmate who always makes the workday enjoyable.
meanings.sent3: During the team meeting, my workmate made a funny joke that made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: My workmate is like a puzzle piece that fits perfectly into our team.
meanings.sent5: Having a reliable workmate can make all the difference in a busy workplace.

meanings.sent1: My workmate and I often grab lunch together during our break.
meanings.sent2: It's important to have good communication with your workmate to ensure smooth collaboration.
meanings.sent3: My workmate surprised me with a thoughtful birthday gift last week.
meanings.sent4: In the office, my workmate is like a beacon of support and encouragement.
meanings.sent5: Finding a trustworthy workmate can lead to a successful and harmonious work environment.
